original_title: ベルサイユのばら 2001 - オスカルとアンドレ編
overview: Takarazuka Revue’s 1992 production of "The Rose of Versailles 2001: Oscar and Andre". This version focuses on the relationship between Oscar and Andre.
tagline: Based on "The Rose of Versailles" by Riyoko Ikeda
title: The Rose of Versailles 2001: Oscar and Andre (Star Troupe, 2001)
